This is an activation of the Endangered Missing Person Alert system. The Idaho State Police is looking for a missing person Norman Murphy Baker who has early onset dementia and is believed to be in danger. He is a 79 year old male that is bald has blue eyes is 5'9" 260 lbs. Authorities say that the missing person may be traveling in a 10ft U-Haul GMC van with Arizona plates A H 7 1 2 0 8 that was last seen heading southbound on HWY 45 from Nampa Idaho. If you have any information on the where abouts of this missing person please contact 9 1 1 immediately.

The Bonner County Sheriff's Office is looking for a missing person who was last seen at 10 A.M. on Friday August 29th in the area of Karebear Lane North Sandpoint Idaho and is believed to be in danger. This is a test of the Emergency Alert System. The system is activated for "Amber Alerts" when children are abducted and investigators wish to enlist your help recovering these children. The National Weather Service and your local public safety officials use the Emergency Alert System to warn you of events that pose threats to your life, health, and property. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to WWW.oralert.gov for more information. Your local broadcasters volunteer their airtime to bring you these messages. This test was originated by Oregon Emergency Management. No action is needed. This is only a test.

Local Area Emergency, Sent from header OTHERS. The Civil Authorities have issued a Local Area Emergency for Clark, ID beginning at 3:31 pm Fri Aug 1 and ending at 5:31 pm Fri Aug 1 (IMG BOI). CAP Reference ID: jeremy.merrell@dhw.idaho.gov,AS-ID-76b929e8-aa08-483c-807d-2c5bde841f51,2025-08-01T15:31:19-06:00 CAP Text: The Civil Authorities have issued a Local Area Emergency for Clark, ID beginning at 3:31 pm and ending at 5:31 pm (fromcap). This is an activation of the Endangered Missing Person Alert system. The Bannock County Sheriff's Office 208-236-7111 is looking for a missing person who was last seen in the Mink Creek Rd. area of Pocatello ID and is believed to be in danger. Linda Zweigart is a 67 year old female 5ft 7in tall 182lbs with brown hair and brown eyes. Authorities say that the missing person may be traveling in a Grey 2017 Hyundai Tucson Idaho Plate 10EDT. If you have any information on the where abouts of this missing person please contact 9 1 1 immediately.

CAP Reference ID: Bradley.Ronge@dhw.idaho.gov,AS-ID-2295b615-aba0-4b69-a06d-36b0e6e7c3f9,2025-07-13T17:11:34-06:00 CAP Text: The Civil Authorities have issued a Child Abduction Emergency for all of Idaho beginning at 5:11 pm and ending at 7:11 pm (fromcap). This is an activation of the Amber Alert system. This is the Idaho State Communications Center. We have just received this important information regarding a child abducted in Bonneville County. The Idaho Falls Police Department is looking for a child who was last seen at 440 east 16th street in Idaho Falls and is believed to be in danger. The child's name is Tatiana Fuentes. She is a 12 year old female 5 foot 2 inches tall 75 pounds with brown eyes and brown hair and was last seen wearing a white shirt with jean shorts and possibly wearing pink Air Jordan shoes. Her ears are pierced and she has a temporary butterfly tattoo on her left forearm. Authorities say that the child may be in the company of Marvin Godoy-Castillo and they may be traveling to Wyoming en route to Colorado in a blue 2012 Ford Fusion 4 door with a replaced silver front bumper and a spoiler on the back with Texas plates WBP6759. Female left with two males and is believed to be in danger. The vehicle was last seen in Swan Valley. If you have any information on the whereabouts of this child please contact the Idaho Falls Police department at 208-529-1200 or dial 9 1 1 immediately.

This is an activation of the Endangered Missing Person Alert system. The Nampa Police Department is looking for a missing person who was last seen at W. Orchard Ave Area of Nampa ID and is believed to be in danger. He is a 59 year old male with brown hair and was last seen wearing shirt sweatpants and no shoes. Authorities say that the missing person is often confused and is in need of regular medication he was last seen on foot. If you have any information on the where abouts of this missing person please contact 9 1 1 immediately.

CAP Reference ID: Bradley.Ronge@dhw.idaho.gov,AS-ID-a248a702-3ddd-4fd4-a51d-d635e63dc26f,2025-06-23T12:30:49-06:00 CAP Text: The Civil Authorities have issued a Child Abduction Emergency for all of Idaho beginning at 12:30 pm and ending at 2:30 pm (fromcap). This is an activation of the AMBER Alert system. The Jefferson County Sheriff's Office is looking for two children who were last seen at 7 P M on June 22 in Monteview Idaho and are believed to be in danger. Child one information: Rachelle Fischer 15 year old female 5 foot 5 inches tall weighs 135 pounds with brown hair and blue eyes wearing a green dress. Child two information: Allen Fischer 13 year old male 5 foot 9 inches tall weighs 135 pounds with blonde hair and blue eyes wearing a blue shirt with blue jeans. Authorities say that the children may be in the company of adult siblings and they may be traveling in a grey Honda sedan with Utah plates that was last seen heading to a F L D S group in Mendon Utah. If you have any information on the where abouts of these children please contact the Jefferson County Sheriff's Office at 2 0 8 7 4 5 9 2 1 0 or dial 9 1 1 immediately.

Child two information: Allen Fischer 13 year old male 5 foot 9 inches tall weighs 135 pounds with blonde hair and blue eyes wearing a blue shirt with blue jeans. Authorities say that the children may be in the company of adult siblings and they may be traveling in a grey Honda sedan with Utah plates that was last seen heading to a F L D S group in Mendon Utah. If you have any information on the where abouts of these children please contact the Jefferson County Sheriff's Office at 2 0 8 7 4 5 9 2 1 0 or dial 9 1 1 immediately.

CAP Reference ID: jeremy.woods@dhw.idaho.gov,AS-ID-483ad226-6788-4e66-b18c-24db80e0de36,2025-06-15T21:39:25-06:00 CAP Text: The Civil Authorities have issued a Local Area Emergency for Canyon, ID beginning at 9:39 pm and ending at 11:39 pm (fromcap). This is an activation of the Endangered Missing Person Alert system. The Nampa Police Department is looking for Bobby Muchow who may be suffering memory loss and is without needed medication and is believed to be in danger. Bobby is a 5' 10" 85 year old male with grey hair and was last seen wearing a blue button up short sleeve shirt blue jeans brown slippers and a baseball cap. He may be traveling in a red Ford F150. If you have any information on the where abouts of this missing person please contact 9 1 1 immediately.

This is a test of the Emergency Alert System. The system is activated for "Amber Alerts" when children are abducted and investigators wish to enlist your help recovering these children. The National Weather Service and your local public safety officials use the Emergency Alert System to warn you of events that pose threats to your life, health, and property. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to WWW.oralert.gov for more information. Your local broadcasters volunteer their airtime to bring you these messages. This test was originated by Oregon Emergency Management. No action is needed. This is only a test.

Local Area Emergency, Sent from header OTHERS. The Civil Authorities have issued a Local Area Emergency for Bonner, ID beginning at 8:27 pm Mon May 5 and ending at 10:27 pm Mon May 5 (IMG BOI). CAP Reference ID: elbert.wright@dhw.idaho.gov,AS-ID-dafc5653-9225-4e17-ac03-c8cb353f8174,2025-05-05T20:27:54-06:00 CAP Text: The Civil Authorities have issued a Local Area Emergency for Bonner, ID beginning at 8:27 pm and ending at 10:27 pm (fromcap). This is an activation of the Endangered Missing Person Alert system. The Bonner County Sheriff's Office is looking for a missing person who was last seen at Florence Avenue in Sandpoint and is believed to be in danger. He is Louis Turner a 74 year old male with red hair and was last seen wearing green flannel blue shirt blue jeans with black suspenders and black slip on shoes. Authorities say that the missing person may be traveling in a 2006 red Ford Explorer Idaho license plate 7 B J 4 8 9 0. If you have any information on the where abouts of this missing person please contact 9 1 1 immediately.

This is a test of the Emergency Alert System. The system is activated for "Amber Alerts" when children are abducted and investigators wish to enlist your help recovering these children. The National Weather Service and your local public safety officials use the Emergency Alert System to warn you of events that pose threats to your life, health, and property. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to WWW.oralert.gov for more information. Your local broadcasters volunteer their airtime to bring you these messages. This test was originated by Oregon Emergency Management. No action is needed. This is only a test.

The Civil Authorities have issued a Child Abduction Emergency for all of Idaho, Malheur, OR, Lincoln, MT, and Spokane, WA beginning at 12:35 am Fri Mar 28 and ending at 2:35 am Fri Mar 28 (IMG BOI). CAP Reference ID: emily.janson@dhw.idaho.gov,AS-ID-d8848353-d84f-4933-b6b3-2c1a0f239e43,2025-03-28T00:35:20-06:00 CAP Text: The Civil Authorities have issued a Child Abduction Emergency for all of Idaho, Malheur, OR, Lincoln, MT, and Spokane, WA beginning at 12:35 am and ending at 2:35 am (fromcap). This is an activation of the AMBER Alert system. The Nampa Police Department is looking for a child who was last seen in Nampa, Idaho and is believed to be in danger. The childs name is Camilia Gomez Perez. She is a 12 year old female with red dyed hair and was last seen wearing a jean jacket, a t-shirt, and jeans. Authorities say that the child may be in the company of Gabrielle Inegus and an unknown tattooed male and they may be traveling in a gray four door passenger vehicle. If you have any information on the where abouts of this child, please contact the Nampa Police Tip Line immediately. 208 465 2206

This is a test of the Emergency Alert System. The system is activated for "Amber Alerts" when children are abducted and investigators wish to enlist your help recovering these children. The National Weather Service and your local public safety officials use the Emergency Alert System to warn you of events that pose threats to your life, health, and property. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to WWW.oralert.gov for more information. Your local broadcasters volunteer their airtime to bring you these messages. This test was originated by Oregon Emergency Management. No action is needed. This is only a test.

This is a test of the Emergency Alert System. The system is activated for "Amber Alerts" when children are abducted and investigators wish to enlist your help recovering these children. The National Weather Service and your local public safety officials use the Emergency Alert System to warn you of events that pose threats to your life, health, and property. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to WWW.oralert.gov for more information. Your local broadcasters volunteer their airtime to bring you these messages. This test was originated by Oregon Emergency Management. No action is needed. This is only a test.

CAP Reference ID: kelley.rawlings@dhw.idaho.gov,AS-ID-d08b2f30-ea05-4878-89bc-f1126d41b25f,2024-09-09T13:44:09-06:00 CAP Text: The Civil Authorities have issued a Child Abduction Emergency for all of Idaho beginning at 1:44 pm and ending at 3:44 pm (fromcap). This is an activation of the AMBER Alert system. The Owyhee County Sheriff is looking for a child who was last seen at Bachman Grade area in Owyhee County and is believed to be in danger. The child's name is Laney Landry. She is a 4 year old female with brown hair and brown eyes. Authorities say that the child may be in the company of Rand Gruber and they may be traveling in a white 2010 Ford Escape with Idaho license plate 1 A L Z N 3 U. If you have any information on the where abouts of this child please contact 9 1 1 or the Owyhee County Sheriff at 2 0 8 4 9 5 1 1 5 4 extension 2 immediately.

CAP Reference ID: eas.localdomain@10.42.8.18,CAPNET-0-1316-20240807001500,2024-08-07T00:15:00-07:00 CAP Text: The Civil Authorities have issued a Required Monthly Test for all of Oregon and Clark, WA beginning at 1:15 am and ending at 4:15 am (fromcap). This is a test of the Emergency Alert System. The system is activated for "Amber Alerts" when children are abducted and investigators wish to enlist your help recovering these children. The National Weather Service and your local public safety officials use the Emergency Alert System to warn you of events that pose threats to your life, health, and property. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to www.oralert.gov for more information. Your local broadcasters volunteer their airtime to bring you these messages. This test was originated by Oregon Emergency Management. This is a test. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to www.oralert.gov for more information.

Immediate Evacuation, Sent from header LOCAL EMERG. The Civil Authorities have issued an Immediate Evacuation for Malheur, OR beginning at 4:31 pm Wed Jul 10 and ending at 4:31 am Thu Jul 11 (IMG BOI). CAP Reference ID: Rharriman@malheurco.org,AS-OR-b5fafc2c-2b8c-4c9f-9ee0-326a97e5f445,2024-07-10T16:31:17-06:00 CAP Text: The Civil Authorities have issued an Immediate Evacuation for Malheur, OR beginning at 4:31 pm Wed Jul 10 and ending at 4:31 am Thu Jul 11 (fromcap). BLM reported that a fire that started this afternoon in the area of Camp Hycliff on Owyhee Lake Road has quickly grown to exceed 500 acres due to the heat and dry grass. BLM called for an immediate evacuation of the entire Owyhee Canyon. If you live or are recreating below the Owyhee Dam, please leave the area immediately. There is no guarantee that BLM will be able to contain this before lives in the canyon are threatened. Monitor your radio and the Malheur County Emergency Management Facebook page for updates. We will send out another emergency message when it is safe to return.

This is a test of the Emergency Alert System. The system is activated for "Amber Alerts" when children are abducted and investigators wish to enlist your help recovering these children. The National Weather Service and your local public safety officials use the Emergency Alert System to warn you of events that pose threats to your life, health, and property. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to www.oralert.gov for more information. Your local broadcasters volunteer their airtime to bring you these messages. This test was originated by Oregon Emergency Management. This is a test. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to www.oralert.gov for more information.

Child Abduction Emergency, Sent from header LOCAL EMERG. The Civil Authorities have issued a Child Abduction Emergency for all of Oregon beginning at 12:34 am Tue Apr 23 and ending at 1:34 am Tue Apr 23 (IMG BOI). CAP Reference ID: 200247_Oregon_State_Police_Oregon_State_Police,1608277884466835,2024-04-22T23:34:50-07:00 CAP Text: The Civil Authorities have issued a Child Abduction Emergency for all of Oregon beginning at 12:34 am and ending at 1:34 am (fromcap). The Washington State Police has requested activation of the Emergency Alert System for an AMBER Alert for Roman Huizar. The victim was taken from Richland Washington at 04-21-2024 05:00 PM. The suspect was driving a 2009, Silver Toyota Corolla, license plate, C B Z 4 7 4 5, Washington, last seen heading possibly headed to Mexico. The suspect has been identified as Elias Huizar. Suspect is described as 5 feet 6 inches with a Medium build, Brown hair, wearing Black hat, black long sleeve, light blue jeans, black shoes. The victim is 1 years old and last seen wearing unknown. If you have any information about this incident, please contact the Oregon AMBER Alert Tip Line at 1 8 6 6 5 AMBER 5 1 8 6 6 5 2 6 2 3 7 5 or call 911. This has been an activation of the Oregon Emergency Alert System.

CAP Reference ID: jeremy.woods@dhw.idaho.gov,AS-ID-b1684350-f6f8-4350-bc5e-782a26f70663,2024-04-20T00:44:51-06:00 CAP Text: The Civil Authorities have issued a Local Area Emergency for Latah, ID beginning at 12:44 am and ending at 2:44 am (fromcap). This is an activation of the Endangered Missing Person Alert system. The Latah County Sherrif's Office is looking for a missing person who was last seen at the 1100 block of East Rock Creek Road Potlatch Idaho and is believed to be in danger. He is a 14 year old male with brown hair and was last seen wearing a maroon short-sleeve shirt blue jeans and Under Armor tennis shoes. If you have any information on the where abouts of this missing person please contact 9 1 1 immediately.

This is a test of the Emergency Alert System. The system is activated for "Amber Alerts" when children are abducted and investigators wish to enlist your help recovering these children. The National Weather Service and your local public safety officials use the Emergency Alert System to warn you of events that pose threats to your life, health, and property. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to www.oralert.gov for more information. Your local broadcasters volunteer their airtime to bring you these messages. This test was originated by Oregon Emergency Management. This is a test. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to www.oralert.gov for more information.

Blue Alert, Sent from header LOCAL EMERG. The Civil Authorities have issued a Blue Alert for all of Idaho beginning at 10:05 am Wed Mar 20 and ending at 11:05 am Wed Mar 20 (IMG BOI). CAP Reference ID: jeremy.elliott@dhw.idaho.gov,AS-ID-3995834a-3810-4d3b-985e-faead2f20130,2024-03-20T10:05:53-06:00 CAP Text: The Civil Authorities have issued a Blue Alert for all of Idaho beginning at 10:05 am and ending at 11:05 am (fromcap). A BLUE ALERT IS BEING ISSUED BY THE IDAHO STATE POLICE ON BEHALF OF THE BOISE POLICE DEPARTMENT. THE BOISE POLICE DEPARTMENT WAS INVOLVED IN A SHOOTING WITH SKYLER MEADE. SKYLER MEADE HAS BEEN DESCRIBED AS A 31 YEAR OLD WHITE MALE 5 FOOT 6 INCHES 150 LBS BALD HEAD TEARDROP TATTOO UNDER HIS LEFT EYE. SKYLER MEADE WAS LAST SEEN WEARING SHORTS AND NO SHIRT. SKYLER WAS LAST SEEN IN THE SAINT ALPHONSUS HOSPITAL AREA IN BOISE. SKYLER IS CONSIDERED ARMED AND DANGEROUS AND MAY BE IN POSSESSION OF WEAPON. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A GRAY HONDA CIVIC WITH IDAHO LICENSE PLATES. THE SUSPECT IS ARMED AND DANGEROUS AND ALL OFFICER SAFETY PROTOCOLS SHOULD BE USED IF LOCATED. IF SEEN CALL 9 1 1 OR 208-377-6790

This is a test of the Emergency Alert System. The system is activated for "Amber Alerts" when children are abducted and investigators wish to enlist your help recovering these children. The National Weather Service and your local public safety officials use the Emergency Alert System to warn you of events that pose threats to your life, health, and property. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to www.oralert.gov for more information. Your local broadcasters volunteer their airtime to bring you these messages. This test was originated by Oregon Emergency Management. This is a test. If this had been an actual emergency, you would be directed to www.oralert.gov for more information.
